name: iDeus
description:
For more than 16 years we’ve accumulated lots of experience in software development for a variety of industries, but mostly we have lots of experience in developing software for the following industries: Online Learning, Ecommerce, Medicine, Various business applications (databases, CRM, ERP).
Our mission: help our clients to make improve a world around us.
What we do: 
PHP (Laravel, YII, Code Igniter, Symfony)
Magento Commerce
Wordpress
Python (Django)
React
React Native
Javascript, ES5-ES7
HTML/CSS/BEM (SASS/LESS/SCSS, Grunt, Webpack, etc.)
MySQL, MariaDB
PostgreSQL
AWS administration
UX/UI (Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, Invision)
